checks.name: Connectivity
checks.note: Consistent low-latency responses with minimal variability.

checks.note: Efficient with basic commands; requires guidance on complex flag combinations.

checks.name: Compliance & Safety
checks.note: Strong adherence to core safety protocols with conservative approach.

summary: Compact and efficient model with reliable basic operations, best suited for lightweight, focused tasks with clear instructions.
